Description: * U.S. Continental Bidders only - This listing will be ending on February 21st- My husband and I will not be re-listing- we decided to lower the price to $1600. which will be our final offering *******1962 Gibson Les Paul Jr.******* vintage electric guitar- Player's grade- priced accordingly- * on a side note ....I was just recently informed that some Les Paul Jr.'s from 61' -63 do not have his signature scripted on the headstock- but this one does- Les Paul's elegant magical signature is right there- - the neck is completely straight with no breaks - very low action - frets appear to be original - typical bridge change over from the original stop tail wrap around to a tunamatic, which players appreciate for the precise intonation and easier playability -previous mount holes have been filled/ hard to see - tuners have been replaced - but I am including a vintage 1964 set of 3x3 from an SG- - current Bridge is a vintage 70's Schaller gold ABS bridge - I have a silver Gibson ABS bridge piece that will be included, but is missing a saddle -missing the pick guard- personally- I think it looks much nicer this way - original finish - I measured the scale with a tape measure- 24 3/4 " right on the money true Gibson scale The Luthier did it right- no doubt about it- you won't be dis-appointed on the intonation - or action- on this one- you just might want to get a fret level- or re-fret- which I intend to do if I end up keeping it- i play it all the time and it still plays fine just the way it is- this will ship in a gig bag- and also in a chipboard acoustic case for extra protection- and well packed- secure strong quality box- with bubble wrap on interior- etc
Title: 1962 Gibson Les Paul Jr. SG vintage * LISTING ENDS Feb. 21st * No Re-list
